text: <!here> I am having issues where the css isnt updating and seems to be reverting back to a previous save
I often see that when there are compile issues with a template, like a HubL syntax error
I always have caching issues. I usually publish my page and it kicks the style changes in (mildly annoying but it works).
<@U6TBZ66FN> Should be able to sort you out

<@U7G631G5P> what is your caching issue specifically? We are aware of an issue about the style change, it sometimes revert to an earlier version, but will be updated to the new version in a few minutes. If that is what you are experiencing, that is an known issue.
so that was the one I was having last week. I've had an issue for quite sometime where when I publish changes to a stylesheet the changes won't be seen for 5 to 10 mins after publishing.
The work around I found is publishing the landing page through the page editor and it will cause the cache to be updated.
That should be a bug. Publishing the css should invalidate the cache on CDN too. Let me see if I can reproduce it.
BTW, is this hubdb related to the change of the sytlesheet? Just noticed this is in the hubdb channel.

<@U38EZFVFE> I think your issue is a known issue. We are working on that. <@U7G631G5P>,  I am not able to reproduce what you have experienced -- update the css, won't see it in 5 to 1o min. I can see my change immediately, or can the change reverted back to earlier version.
<@U6TBZ66FN> it reverts back and then "catches up" after a minute or so
